content.rendered:
This treatment restores hair resiliency; humidity, rain or sweat will no longer affect the hairstyle. No more frizzy hair! The treatment can be used on all hair types, including chemically treated hair (coloured, permed, relaxed, highlighted and bleached). It is excellent for getting rid of curly, frizzy, damaged, unhealthy, dull, mistreated hair.

Charcoal Relaxing treatment is not permanent. The treatment fades progressively as hair is washed. The wave or curl will gradually come back in up to 2 months. The hair will stay soft, shiny and healthy looking. The treatment also makes the hair very manageable. Taking care of the hair after the Charcoal Relaxing Treatment is applied is effortless. The amount of time required to style hair will decrease dramatically, in some cases it is wash and go. Others require some blow drying and minimum styling time.

The Charcoal Relaxing Treatment difference:

  • Lasts from to 3-4 months
  • Smooths up to 60-70%
  • Do not mistake it for a Latino, Keratin, Brazilian Keratin, Thermal Reconditioning or Chemical Relaxer. It is a treatment!
  • It will not make the hair flat
  • There are no fumes, irritation or discomfort while you are having it done
  • You must colour your hair afterwards as your colour may fade.

All bookings, consultations and general enquiries can be arranged either by phone, online or with the Luxe staff in the salon.

excerpt.rendered: Using the technology of keratin and charcoal extracts, the Charcoal Relaxing Treatment smooths the hair without damaging or changing its texture.
